description.headline: Blue collar
description.discription: People use the terms white collar and blue collar to refer to various categories of workers in the economy. Manual work is typically involved in blue-collar jobs. Examples include truck drivers, manufacturing employees, welders, and construction personnel. Most white-collar workers spend their days in offices. A person from the working class who does manual labour is known as a blue-collar worker. Skilled or unskilled labour may be included in blue-collar work.

titleList.title1: Soft Skills Required For Blue Collar Jobs
titleList.titlepoint:
• Leadership
  • Collaboration
  • Persistence - to persevere through difficulties
  • Discipline - to advance academically & professionally
  • Patience - to remain composed
  • Ethics - an attitude of dedication

titleList.title1: Technical Skills Required For Blue Collar Jobs
titleList.titlepoint:
• Technical Skills Required For Blue Collar Jobs
  • Plumbing - to pick up extra work as a handyman mending faulty pipes or unclogging drains, plumbing is an excellent skill
  • Car Maintenance - A great talent to have is the ability to perform simple auto maintenance
  • Landscaping - Developing abilities in landscaping can be a quick and simple way to get extra money
  • Low-Voltage Electronics - With this skill ability, you can enjoy the splendor of a fancy home theater or outdoor speaker system while also increasing the worth of your residence

description.discription1: If you're looking for workers for Blue-Collar professions or for occupations like Logistics and Home Services, the Hirect App will help you find qualified people.

description.headline: BPO & KPO
description.discription: Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) has grown in popularity over time by delivering services such as marketing, human resources, customer service, technical support, and so on. Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO) is a subsegment of BPO in which procedures including knowledge-related activity are outsourced to a third party. There is a narrow line between BPO and KPO.

titleList.title1: Soft Skills Required for BPO & KPO Jobs
titleList.titlepoint:
• Good communication
  • English fluency - For International BPO - US, UK Process
  • Knowledge of languages - you must be fluent in English, Hindi, and a regional language.
  • Patience - to receive calls for at least 8 hours while being calm.
  • Flexible with Shifts (Ready to do any Shift)

titleList.title1: Technical Skills Required For BPO & KPO Jobs
titleList.titlepoint:
• Basic computer skills - As you need to enter the detailed interaction on the PC
  • Technical Knowledge and Understanding of Products/Services
  • Quality metrics and tools
  • Project management
  • Raw data analysis and processing
  • Statistical expertise

description.discription1: Through the Hirect App, you can hire candidates looking for BPO & KPO with expertise in Telemarketer, Virtual Assistant.

description.headline: Consulting
description.discription: A consultant is a person who offers professional or expert advice in a certain scientific or business subject to an organization or individual, according to the definition given by consultancy. A consultant is a specialist who offers guidance and performs other useful tasks in a particular specialty. In general, professional services include consulting services.

titleList.title1: Soft Skills Required For Consulting Jobs
titleList.titlepoint:
• Creative thinking
  • Problem-solving
  • Communicating clearly and empathetically
  • Organization
  • Time management

titleList.title1: Technical Skills Required For Consulting Jobs
titleList.titlepoint:
• Thinking conceptually - Conceptual thinking says that you are imaginative and visionary
  • Practical thinking - ability to translate their vision into deliverables and actionable tasks
  • Collaboration with all job levels - to feel confident when interacting with both stakeholders and staff
  • Curiosity - You can get the knowledge you need to execute your job properly by being curious
  • Credibility - Gaining genuine trust, integrity, and dependability is its main characteristic
  • Analytical skill
  • Decision-making
  • Attention To Detail
  • Data analysis
  • Strategic thinking
  • Conflict resolution

description.discription1: If you need to fill positions like Consultant, Financial consultant, Human Resources Consultant, IT Consultant, Project Management Consultant, Strategy Consultant, Business Consultant, Education Consultant, Fashion Consultant, Headhunting Consultant, Legal Consultant, Risk Advisory Consultant, Startup Consultant, or Technical Consultant, the Hirect App will help you find qualified candidates.

description.headline: Design
description.discription: A designer creates works of art and design ideas that can take on a variety of shapes. They usually work on coming up with a variety of ideas, picking the best ones, and selling them to the other team members and clients. They also foster creativity by encouraging others to share ideas and communicate effectively with management and clients to keep them informed of project milestones.

titleList.titlepoint:

  • Time management

  • Presentation

  • Interactive Media

description.headline: Education/Training
description.discription: The responsibility of a Trainer or Educator or Teacher is to create, prepare, and present lesson ideas and teaching resources that encourage active learning. They create lesson plans, test questions, and work schemes in conformity with accepted practices. They teach and supervise students as they use the tools and materials for learning. Their communication skills should only be surpassed by their understanding of the subject or their field.

titleList.titlepoint:

description.headline: Finance
description.discription:
The study and discipline of money, currency, and capital assets are known as finance. It is related to but not the same as economics, which is the study of the production, distribution, and consumption of money, assets, goods, and services. Raising funds or capital for any type of expenditure is referred to as finance. It is the process of directing various funds in the form of credit, loans, or invested capital to those economic entities that require them the most or can put them to the best use.


Companies seeking Finance Professionals like an Accountant, Chartered Accountant or Investment Manager may look at these skills.

titleList.title1: Soft Skills Required in Finance Jobs
titleList.titlepoint:
• Negotiation
  • Critical Thinking
  • Flexibility
  • Resilience
  • Collaboration
  • Attention to Detail
  • Interpersonal Skills

titleList.title1: Technical Skills Required in Finance Jobs
titleList.titlepoint:
• Training and Education
  • Knowledge of IT Software
  • Problem-Solving
  • Analytical Skills
  • Financial Reporting
  • Tax and Compliance
  • Cash Management
  • Bank Reconciliation Processes
  • Customer Relationship Management
  • General Ledger and Record to Report Process

description.discription1: Companies can hire Finance Professionals across various functional areas, including Hire Accountant, Hire Chartered Accountant or Hire Investment Manager from the Hirect app.

description.headline: IT Engineering
description.discription: IT engineers are high-level Information Technology professionals who design, install, and maintain a company's computer systems. They are in charge of testing, configuring, and troubleshooting hardware, software, and networking systems to meet the employer's needs. They are required to design and install computer hardware configurations, software and networking systems, and troubleshoot network and software issues. Companies hiring IT engineers may also ask them to train employees and manage projects.

titleList.title1: Soft Skills Required in IT Engineering
titleList.titlepoint:
• Communication Skills
  • Management Skills
  • Time Management
  • Critical Thinking
  • Collaboration
  • Attention to Detail
  • Accountability
  • Creativity
  • Ability to Learn

titleList.titlepoint:
• Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Engineering
  • Knowledge of Computer Hardware Systems
  • Coding Skills
  • PHP, Ruby on Rails, Ruby or C++, C# Languages
  • Familiarity with General OS Systems
  • Enterprise Programming Language
  • Knowledge of LAN and Wireless Network
  • Troubleshooting complex software and hardware issues
  • Knowledge of Database and Networking Security Systems

description.discription1: Companies can hire IT professionals across various verticals such as Hire PHP Developer, Hire Backend Developer, Hire Ruby on Rails Developer, and Hire Ruby Developer from Hirect App.

description.headline: Manufacturing
description.discription: Manufacturing is any industry that uses manual labor or machinery to create products from raw materials. This process is typically done in a systematic manner with a division of labor. Manufacturing can also refer to the relatively large-scale manufacture or assembling of parts into completed goods. Production of autos, chemicals, clothes, consumer electronics, furniture, heavy machinery, refined petroleum products, ships, steel, tools, and dies are a few of the most significant manufacturing sectors.

titleList.title1: Soft Skills Required for Manufacturers Jobs
titleList.titlepoint:
• Critical thinking
  • Problem solving
  • Teamwork
  • Attention to detail
  • Communication skills
  • Leadership
  • Analytical skills

titleList.title1: Technical Skills Required For Manufacturers Jobs
titleList.titlepoint:
• Quality management system - to fix the problems
  • Welding - for fusing of materials
  • Machining - to perform various processes on materials like drilling, grinding, etc.
  • Product design - to convert concept into design
  • Mechanical engineering - to safely operate specialized machinery.
  • Robotics - to program and repair robotic systems
  • Computer programming - Proficiency with computer programming languages

description.discription1: Hirect App can assist you in finding the best individuals if you need to fill employment roles related to Manufacturing professions including Manufacturing in the Chemical Industry, General Manufacturing, Design and Manufacturing, Production & Operation, Apparel/Textile/Furniture, or Other Roles.

description.headline: Marketing Professionals
description.discription:
While many verticals exist within the marketing domain, certain skills and attributes are required of all marketers to produce desired results.


Marketing Professionals work closely with communication and sales strategies in a company. They have a very important role, both for the positioning of a brand in the market, and for any type of communication and for the financial return that the business expects. They are responsible for identifying and articulating the strategies and techniques to be used to attract customers to a business. Likewise, they determine the pricing based on product demand and supply, help maximize a firm's profits, and grow market share for a business. They also aid in new product development and critique market trends.


Using proper recruiting practices is the key to finding skilled marketing professionals. Candidates with the necessary skills, talent, behavioral qualities, and subject expertise will enter your workforce if you have a competitive recruitment strategy in place.

titleList.title1: Skills required to be a Marketing Professional
titleList.titlepoint:
• Communication skills
  • Creative thinking
  • Leadership skills
  • Interpersonal skills

titleList.title1: Technical Skills required to be a Marketing Professional
titleList.titlepoint:
• Ability to recognize market trends
  • Problem-solving
  • Data analysis
  • Content editing
  • SEO/SEM expertise

description.discription1: Companies can hire for Operations team such as Hire TeleCallers or Hire Operations Manager from Hirect app.

description.headline: Media
description.discription: The management of platforms that convey important information to people who desire. It is the focus of a media career. Local news anchors, Hollywood film directors, and all other types of media professionals work in the industry. They all share the ability to enlighten the public of knowledge. They manage all interactions with the media in general. The position comprises a wide range of duties, such as writing press releases, setting up press events and interviews, coordinating with media contacts, and keeping track of how the organization is being covered by the media.

titleList.titlepoint:

  • Content Curation

  • Flexibility

  • Listening
  • Internal Wiring and Story Harvesting
  • Engagement

description.headline: Operations
description.discription: Managing the inner workings of your business so that it runs as efficiently as possible is known as operations. Every small business owner must oversee the design and management of behind-the-scenes work, whether they make products, sell products, or provide services. Operations are the key to a growing business. The job profiles under this will include TeleCallers or operations managers.

description.headline: Personnel
description.discription:
Personnel is the department in a large company or organization that deals with employees, keeps their records, and helps with any problems they might have. It could also mean a body of persons usually employed (as in a factory or organization). Personnel jobs include functional areas like Human Resources, Administration and so on.


Companies seek primary soft skills in candidates for these positions. Look at the list of soft skills required for Personnel jobs.

description.headline: Real Estate / Construction
description.discription: Building, renovation, and maintenance of residential and commercial buildings are part of the construction industry. Some examples are residential construction, commercial construction, bridge erection, roadway paving, excavations, demolitions, and large-scale painting jobs. The term “Real Estate industry” refers to all businesses that buy, sell, or rent land, buildings, or housing. Companies can hire structural engineers, hire real estate brokers, or hire real estate agents from Hirect.

description.headline: Sales and Business Development Professionals
description.discription:
E-commerce, retail, pharmaceuticals, FMCG, clothing and fashion, cosmetics, furniture, aerospace, manufacturing, chemicals, and so on all require a result-oriented sales department. Hence, sales and business development positions are in high demand across India.


When it comes to the growth of these startups, business development is critical. Their contribution directly helps a business increase revenue while also improving customer service and brand awareness. A skilled sales and business development professional are primarily responsible for lead generation and sales growth.


Using proper recruiting practices is the key to finding skilled sales and business development professionals. Candidates with the necessary skills, talent, behavioral qualities, and subject expertise will enter your workforce if you have a competitive recruitment strategy in place.

titleList.title1: Skills required to be a Sales Professional
titleList.titlepoint:
• Interpersonal skills
  • Communication skills
  • Time-management
  • Problem-solving skills
  • Result-oriented approach

description.discription: The service industry is a prominent industry that creates services or intangible assets across verticals like Hotel, Beauty/ Fitness, Food and Catering and Retail rather than tangible products. Organizations across the service industry may hire waiters, hotel managers, hire makeup artists, hire gym trainers, chef, hire pastry chef or many more such job roles.

description.headline: Agriculture
description.discription: Professionals in the large field of agriculture may work in a number of fields, including sales, administration, engineering, research, or manual labor. Planning, producing, marketing, and selling agricultural products are all possible job paths in the agricultural industry. Being an important sector of the Indian economy, candidates are currently inclined towards the agriculture industry for their career prospects from all over the nation.
